name: qskinny
description: This extension provides usefull commands to accelerate QSkinny / C++ code generation

commands.title: QSK: QSK_SUBCONTROLS(...) => QSK_SUBCONTROL(..., ...)
commands.description: Transforms a QSK_SUBCONTROLS(...) selection into a sequence of QSK_SUBCONTROL(..., ...) initializations (one per subcontrol)

commands.title: QSK: QSK_SUBCONTROLS(...) => if( subControl == ...)
commands.description: Transforms a QSK_SUBCONTROLS(...) selection into a sequence of empty (else)if statements (one per subcontrol)

commands.title: QSK: QSK_SUBCONTROLS(...) => enum NodeRole { ... }
commands.description: Transforms a QSK_SUBCONTROLS(...) selection into a node roles enum declaration (one enumerator per subcontrol)

commands.title: QSK: QSK_STATES(...) => QSK_STATE(..., ..., ...)
commands.description: Transforms a QSK_STATES(...) selection into a sequence of QSK_STATE(..., ..., QskAspect::FirstUserState << ...) initializations (one per subcontrol)

commands.title: QSK: QSK_STATES(...) => QSK_SYSTEM_STATE(..., ..., ...)
commands.description: Transforms a QSK_STATES(...) selection into a sequence of QSK_STATE(..., ..., QskAspect::FirstSystemState << ...) initializations (one per subcontrol)

commands.title: QSK: enum NodeRole => switch(...)
commands.description: Transforms an enumeration selection into a switch statement (one case per subcontrol)

commands.title: QSK: enum NodeRole => template<NodeRole>
commands.description: (Advanced Command) Creates empty updateSubNode<NodeRole> function for each node role

commands.title: QSK: enum NodeRole => switch(...) template<NodeRole>
commands.description: (Advanced Command) Creates a switch case statement returning updateSubNode<NodeRole> for each node role

commands.title: QSK: Skinnable + Skinlet
commands.description: Semi-interactive command that creates a skinnable and skinlet template

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
